column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////But the customer appreciation did not stop there: When we asked for the bill
column2: the waiter informed us it was fully on the house. We did not saw this coming as during the entire time we were there the server was consistently asking if we would like to have more appetizers and drinks while waiting for the dinner. We expressed that we were very satisfied with the experience and wanted to pay as we were already very pleased with all the consideration
column3: but the manager insisted that it was their way to say thank you for the time we spent there.
